text: By using the Services, you acknowledge that any Personal Data about you, regardless of whether provided by you or obtained from a third party, is being provided to Rootly in the U.S. and will be hosted on U.S. servers, and you authorize Rootly to transfer, store and process your information to and in the U.S., and possibly other countries.

The Services use cookies and similar technologies such as pixel tags, web beacons, clear GIFs and JavaScript (collectively, "Cookies") to enable our servers to recognize your web browser, tell us how and when you visit and use our Services, analyze trends, learn about our user base and operate and improve our Services. Cookies are small pieces of data- usually text files - placed on your computer, tablet, phone or similar device when you use that device to access our Services.
Data sent to OpenAI is solely used for providing Rootly AI services and is neither stored nor used for training purposes by OpenAI.
